sentence:

Mr. Speaker, as a Vice Co-Chair of the Hellenic Caucus and  a proud Greek-American, I rise today to welcome His All-Holiness  Bartholomew I, Ecumenical Patriarch of Constantinople, to the United  States, the spiritual leader of the Orthodox Christian community around  the world. …of Imvros was elected in October 1991 as the 270th  Archbishop of the 2000-year-old Church founded by the Apostle Andrew.  He holds the historic title of Archbishop of Constantinople-New Rome  and Ecumenical Patriarch, a position that dates back to the sixth  century.
